channel.title: Making new ranks
channel.description:
Well on some servers i see like infront of some admins it will say councilman, I want to know how to add that to my server, Also where it says for me Founder of ......
Thanks. :D

item.title: Making new ranks
item.dc:creator: @boxhad boxhad
item.description:
@boxhad wrote:

Thats not what i wanted like theres a server exorth and on it, If you right click on a admin it will say like councilman, and if you right click on owner it willl say Founder of (server name). The question im asking is i dont know how to make it so like infront of there name when you right click it says councilman. Thanks

Read full topic

item.title: Making new ranks
item.dc:creator: @Deathspirit Deathspirit
item.description:
@Deathspirit wrote:

[code][code]Go in your Client.Java and find

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

Then under it put

if (playerRights == 2){ yell("Your admin login text here...."); }

And for you…

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Your Playername here")) { yell("Your login text here...."); }
If you done that Compile and run and test if it works. Post any errors[/code][/code]

Read full topic
